tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AviationCompliance (
  compliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  documentation TEXT,
  flight_records TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE flight_records (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_number VARCHAR(20),
  departure_date DATE,
  departure_time TIME,
  arrival_date DATE,
  arrival_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE flight_records (
  flight_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_id UUID REFERENCES aircraft(id),
  pilot_id UUID REFERENCES pilots(id),
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
	compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	flight_id INT,
	doc_id INT,
	compliance_status BOOLEAN,
	FOREIGN KEY (flight_id) REFERENCES flight_records(flight_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (doc_id) REFERENCES documentation(doc_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FlightRecords (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_date DATE,
    pilot_name VARCHAR(100),
    aircraft_type VARCHAR(50),
    departure_location VARCHAR(100),
    arrival_location VARCHAR(100)
);
